mapper.select: SELECT MENU_CD AS CODE ,MENU_KRN_NM AS NAME FROM HIST_MENU WHERE MENU_CATE = 'F' AND BLTN_CRET_YN = 'Y'

SELECT BLTN_CD, MENU_CD, BLTN_NUM, BLTN_SEQ, TITL, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(CTN, DBMS_LOB.GETLENGTH(CTN), 1) AS CTN, INQ_CNT, USE_YN, (SELECT E.EMP_NM ||' ('|| E.EMP_NUM ||')' FROM HIST_EMP E WHERE E.EMP_NUM = HIST_BLTN.RGST_EMP_NUM) AS RGST_EMP, TO_CHAR(RGST_DTIM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS RGST_DTIM, (SELECT E.EMP_NM ||' ('|| E.EMP_NUM ||')' FROM HIST_EMP E WHERE E.EMP_NUM = HIST_BLTN.CORCT_EMP_NUM) AS CORCT_EMP, TO_CHAR(CORCT_DTIM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CORCT_DTIM FROM HIST_BLTN WHERE MENU_CD = #{srchMenuCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY BLTN_SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HIST_BLTN ( BLTN_CD, MENU_CD, BLTN_NUM, BLTN_SEQ, TITL, CTN, INQ_CNT, USE_YN, RGST_EMP_NUM, RGST_DTIM ) VALUES ( (SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(BLTN_CD), 0) + 1, 9, '0') FROM HIST_BLTN), #{MENU_CD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(BLTN_NUM), 0) + 1 FROM HIST_BLTN WHERE MENU_CD = #{MENU_CD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{BLTN_SEQ, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TITL, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CTN, jdbcType=CLOB}, 0, #{USE_YN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{REG_USR_ID}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE HIST_BLTN SET BLTN_SEQ = #{BLTN_SEQ, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITL = #{TITL, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTN = #{CTN, jdbcType=CLOB}, USE_YN = #{USE_YN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORCT_EMP_NUM = #{REG_USR_ID}, CORCT_DTIM = SYSDATE WHERE BLTN_CD = #{BLTN_CD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM HIST_BLTN WHERE BLTN_CD = #{BLTN_CD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
